parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application. Specify this parameter if you want to filter applications by application name.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The cluster ID. Specify this parameter if you want to filter applications by cluster.

parameters.name: LogicalRegionId
parameters.description: The namespace ID. Specify this parameter if you want to filter applications by namespace.

parameters.name: LogicalRegionIdFilter
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace that you use in the exact search to filter applications.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. Specify this parameter if you want to filter applications by resource group.
